tooltip.electrodynamics.creativepowersou: "Unlimited Power" - Buck Rogers from Star Trek
tooltip.electrodynamics.info.capacityupg: Multiplies Energy Capacity and Transfer by %sx
Will upgrade machine voltage up to %s
tooltip.electrodynamics.itemwire.info.ce: Does not shock you for V <= 480.0V
tooltip.electrodynamics.itemwire.info.hi: Does not shock you for V <= 960.0V
tooltip.electrodynamics.itemwire.info.in: Does not shock you for V <= 240.0V
tooltip.electrodynamics.seismicscanner.u: Scans for ores in a 16 block radius
